Not a word spoken.

Activate mini-cams.

Anderson, Boyer and the other S.E.A.L.s flip on TINY VIDEOCAMERAS

mounted on their shoulders.  A NAVAL MEDIC passes out SYRINGES OF

ATROPINE in ANKLE SHFATHES.

Atropine.  Any contact with the gas, use it.

Each S.E.A.L. takes one; begins strapping it to ankle. GOODSPEED 

shakes his head, declining.
Uhn uhn.  I hate needles.

heading.raw_text: INT.  PIER 39 - MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS TRAILER - NIGHT

segments.content:
AT THE CONTROL PANEL - F.B.I. TECHNICIANS talk into headsets and watch a

bank of MONITORS displaying: satellite pictures, thermographic images of

Alcatraz, a computer bio of Hummel.

SANCHEZ sits at the control panel wearing a headset. Director Womack

paces behind him.
Mini-cams operational.

An F.B.I. SEDAN pulls in and parks.  F.B.I. AGENT CORD gets out. carla

sits in the back seat.
Would you please tell me what is going on?
Can't do that, malam.  Sorry.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER SAN FRANCISCO BAY - NIGHT

segments.content:
The Hueys and Sea Stallion fly in formation AT CAMERA.  The Sea

Stallion's running lights suddenly BLINK OFF.

The two SEA STALLION PILOTS don NIGHT VISION GOGGLES.

IN THE HOLD - THE S.E.A.L.s begin to prepare themselves; checking their

weapons combat wet-suits, and CLOSED CIRCUIT REBREATHER SCUBA TANKS.

The S.E.A.L.s begin to don their scuba apparatus.
You know what you're doing?

Yes.  Little fancier than I'm used to.

MASON examines the equipment.  It's more modern, but not foreign to him.

 He adjusts his depth and oxygen gauges.  Goodspeed, having a hard time,

watches Mason.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER SAN FRANCISCO BAY - NIGHT

segments.content:
THE HUEYS, 50 ft. from the water's surface, SCREAM PAST CAMERA and bear

down on Alcatraz.

THE SEA STALLION, lagging behind the Hueys, BANKS RIGHT and peels away. 

It descends lower, below radar.

The F.B.I. RADAR TECHNICIAN watches the RADAR SCREEN. ..Glowing BLIPS

move toward Alcatraz.  One BLIP vanishes.

They're off radar, headin' 'round Treasure

Island.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER TREASURE ISLAND - NIGHT

segments.content:
The Sea Stallion rounds Treasure Island and heads toward the rear of

Alcatraz Island.

The SEA STALLION PILOT turns to ANDERSON.

SEA STALLION PILOT I got you to the strongest current in the Bay,

Commander.  You're on your own from here.
Prepare to deplore!

heading.subject: T TO: A SERIES OF SHOTS.
heading.raw_text: CUT TO: A SERIES OF SHOTS.

segments.content:
The S.E.A.L.s stand.  Each checks the gear of the man in front of him. 

Straps tightened.  Weapons checked. -

IN THE REAR OF THE HOLD-- FOUR S.E.A.L.s ready two high-tech 139B 3-man

submersibles called 'IS.D.U.sll (Seal Delivery Units), also known as

"Seal Subs."

MASON is ready to go, calm and steady, eyes forward. GOODSPEED'S still

behind.  He has his scuba tanks shouldered, but he can't get the 

lst of the tricky cATcHEs on the shoulder harness secured ...

MASON reaches over and secures, with a METALLIC DLINK, the catch. 

Goodspeed, embarrassed, nods.

heading.subject: AT THE BACK OF THE HOLD
heading.raw_text: AT THE BACK OF THE HOLD

segments.content:
139F SHEPHERD, with a nod, directs MASON  

to sit down on the S.D.U.

behind S.E.A.L. BOYER, the S.D.U.ls driver.

MASON does so.  Chaney then sits behind Mason.  S.E.A.L. Dando then

begins buckling Shepherd and MASON  

onto the sled with harnesses (the unit's version of a seat-belt.)

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SAN FRANCISCO BAY (OFF ALCATRAZ) - NIGHT

segments.content:
The Sea Stallion hovers 15 ft. from the surface.  The BELLY DOOR opens. 

COMMANDER ANDERSON leans out, inspecting the drop area. he hand-signals

to --

-- S.E.A.L. DANDO, reading the two S.D.U.s. GOODSPEED 

sits on the SECOND S.D.U. behind S.E.A.L. REIGERT.  S.E.A.L. Dando begins 

buckling in Goodspeed.

Wait a minute.

						(Dando stops buckling) 

		What if this thing crashes ...

Dando looks at Reigert.  They laugh.  This remark they

obviously find very funny.  Dando continues buckling GOODSPEED 

in.

Smile Goodspeed.  Live a little.  Life is short...  especially

		yours.

And the S.D.U.ls are released, rolling out of the Sea Stallion on a set

of tracks, SPLASHING DOWN into --

-- the bay here.  The S.D.U.s' XENON headlamps

come on.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  THE SEA STALLION - DOORWAY - NIGHT

segments.content:
The rest of the S.E.A.L.s,

carrying equipment and single man mini-S.D.U. units, jump from the Sea

Stallion one by one.

The three-man and single S.D.U.s head toward

Alcatraz, passing ABOVE CAMERA.

THE SEARCHLIGHT atop the lower

lighthouse scans the bay, back and forth.  It fixes on something.

Hummel and Baxter watch from

the window.  Captain Fryels voice emanates from the walkie-talkie.

Something on radar, sir.  Two Hueys in standard

		formation, due east and approaching.

Hummel raises binoculars.  Scans the bay.

HUMMEL'S POV - THROUGH BINOCULARS - THE HUEYS AND SEA STALLION, flying

low, SCREAM toward the island.

BACK TO SCENE - HUMMEL lowers the binoculars, clicks on his

walkie-talkie.
Decoy?

Royce, Scarpetti, Gamble, Starling: get to the west end of the

		island on the double.  Think we have visitors.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - WATER TOWER - ALLEY - NIGHT

segments.content: Pvt.  Royce clicks off his walkie-talkie.

You heard the man, let's move it.

Pvts.  Royce, Scarpetti, Gamble and.Starling race off.

heading.time_of_day: NIGHT The S.E.A.L.s, pulled by their S.D.U.s, WHOOSH
heading.raw_text: EXT.  UNDERWATER - NIGHT The S.E.A.L.s, pulled by their S.D.U.s, WHOOSH

segments.content:
past camera. The S.D.U.s lights dim the FLUORESCENT GREEN.

CLOSE-UP on BOYER, the three-man S.D.U.ls driver, intense, determined.

CLOSE-UP on Boyer's fluorescent green INSTRUMENT PANEL charting their

approach to the island.

They've drawn close to the island.  ' COMMANDER ANDERS6N swings an

UNDERWATER SPOTLIGHT, which reveals --

A LARGE WATER INTAKE PIPE jutting out from the Island's bedrock, 7 ft.

in diameter, covered by a GRATE thick with rust, barnacles and seaweed. 

There's a SMALL JAGGED HOLE, presumably through which MASON  

escaped 33

years earlier.

heading.subject: POWER P     . INTAKE PIPE
heading.raw_text: EXT.  UNDERWATER - POWER P     . INTAKE PIPE - NIGHT The S.E.A.L.s cast

segments.content:
off the S.D.U.s and direct their GREEN FLUORESCENT SPOTLIGHTS inside the

hole in the grate.

MASON  stares at the hole.  COMMANDER ANDERSON 

nods to Mason: "lead the way." MASON  does so.  Enters the pipe. one by one, 

the S.E.A.L.s and GOODSPEED follow MASON in.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - SHORELINE NEAR POWER PLANT - NIGHT

segments.content:
Pvts.  Royce, Scarpetti, Gamble and Starling walk the shoreline, peering

into the black water.
Looks all clear, sir.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - NIGHT

segments.content: Baxter turns to Hummel:
Nothing.
Tell 'em to stay out there.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - SUBTERRANEAN POWER PLANT - NIGHT

segments.content:
A large subterranean room under the island's . power plant. ...	large

WOODEN CISTERN in the middle.

The S.E.A.L.s emerge in the cistern and climb out.  The room . has one

exit, sealed with a HEAVY IRON door.

Thank-you very fucking much, Mr. Mason, you've led us

		to a room with no exit.
Skipper, blow it or burn it?

No time for the torch.  Explosives'll bring the

		fucking world down on us. (turns to Mason) An idea, please, we're tight

		on time.
Wait for me to unlock the door.

You do not look like Jesus Christ, Mr. Mason, so I'm

		having a hard time how you're going to accomplish that.

(points)

		Under there.

UNDERNEATH THE STEAM ENGINE is a tiny crawl space. 10 STEAM RELEASE

VALVES periodically emit BURSTS OF STEAM.

You are shitting me.  You catch one of those steam

		bursts and you're a corpse.

True. 

				(unshoulders his equipment)

		I memorized their timing.

MASON sits on the edge of the crawl space.  F.B.I. looks inside the

crawl space: WHITE HOT BURSTS of 500 degree Fahrenheit steam BLAST DOWN.
Uhh sir, you said never leave his side ...

You're not required to follow, Lieutenant Shepherd. 

		This man is going to die.

(grumbles to himself) 

		That's been said to me before ....

MASON takes a deep breath and he rolls --

logrolls one revolution...  STEAM

BURST another evolution STEAM BURST another revolution STEAM BURST

MASON  rolls to a stop on his side.  STEAM BURSTS on either side of him. 

MASON collects himself.  Breathes deeply and rolls again.  His movements

are precise, from memory.  He rolls past.each burst, any imprecision

certain death ...

IN THE CISTERN ROOM - GOODSPEED, ANDERSON AND THE S.E.A.L.s watch Mason,

amazed.
Who the fuck is this guy?  Houdini?

rolls past the STEAM RELEME VALVE and

disappears.

IN THE CISTERN ROOM - Several seconds pass.  We HEAR THE DOOR being

unbolted.  It CREAKS open.  There stands Mason.
Welcome to the Rock.

heading.subject: UNDER ALCATRAZ
heading.time_of_day: NIGHT Here, the tunnel moves up a steep
heading.raw_text: INT.  TUNNELS UNDER ALCATRAZ - NIGHT Here, the tunnel moves up a steep

segments.content:
incline to a LOCKED STEEL BULKHEAD.  S.E.A.L.s REIGERT and DANDO check

it out.
She's at least three inches thick sir.

Shit.  Burn it.

Dando unpacks an ACETYLENE TORCH.  Reigert turns on the ACETYLENE VALVES

(tanks rigged to Dandols gear) and sparks the torch.  IT FLAMES UP,

white hot.

Dando starts toward the bulkhead.  MASON steps past him, bending his

KITCHEN FORK into an awkward shape.  He fishes the fork in the lock;

twists it, and...... POP.

MASON  throws open the thick bulkhead door.  And climbs through the

bulkhead.

(muttering) 

		Guys are worthless.
Who is this guy... ?

locations: DRAINAGE PIPES LTNDER MAIN CELL HOUSE
heading.raw_text: INT.  DRAINAGE PIPES LTNDER MAIN CELL HOUSE - NIGHT The team arrives at

segments.content:
a series of concrete drainage pipes. MASON  

points up to one of them.

The shower room? 

						(MASON nods yes) 

		After you.

MASON and the S.E.A.L.s climb into the drainage pipe.

heading.raw_text: INT.  DRAINAGE PIPE UNDER SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT The S.E.A.L. team, Mason

segments.content:
leading the way, climbs toward a FAINT LIGHT emanating from a DRAINAGE

GRATE above.

S.E.A.L. REIGERT readies a FIBRE OPTIC SEEING DEVICE; he pushes the

fibre-optic camera up through the grate.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - PRISON SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT

segments.content:
The FIBER-OPTIC CAMERA turns, looking in a 360 degree radius, and

transmitting images of --

THE PRISON SHOWER - a tiled room with shower heads and a 20 160A ft.

ceiling.  Above, a mezzanine circles the showers; here Alcatraz's guards

once watched inmates below..

heading.raw_text: INT.  DRAINAGE PIPE UNDER SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT

segments.content:
Commander Anderson views the shower room images on a TINY (2 inch by 2

inch) WRIST-HELD VIDEO MONITOR.  The shower is deserted, but there's

something of interest ~-

A MOTION DETECTOR (a blue beam flashed from a transmitter to 161A a

receptor) across the grate.

Motion sensor.

Anderson gingerly lifts the grate.  Reigert wiggles his hands past the

edges of the grate and nudges the beam transmitter (with one hand) and

the beam receiver (with the other) away from the grate.

A SILENT ALARM next to Pvt.  Royce blinks on.  Royce turns to Maj. 

Baxter.

Sir.  Anti-disturbance temblar tripped in the shower.  We got

		visitors.

heading.raw_text: INT.  MAIN CELL HOUSE - SHOWER ROOM

segments.content:
The grate pops open.  S.E.A.IL.s BOYER and REIGERT, wearing NIOHT VISION

GLASSES, emerge taking defensive positions back-to-back.  Commander

Anderson follows.  Then, one by one, the rest of the S.E.A.L.s emerge.

(to Lt.  Shepherd in the drainage pipe) 

		Stand fast. We'll secure the area.

ANDERSON directs Boyer and Reigert to a TILED COLUMN.  They creep across

the tiled floor, taking "check and defefid" positions behind the

shower's TILED COLUMNS.  But suddenly, shockingly.....FLOODLIGHTS flash

on.  Coming from the mezzanine above.

The S.E.A.L.s whip off their night vision goggles.

heading.subject: 165 INT.  PIER 3-9
heading.raw_text: 165 INT.  PIER 3-9 - MOBILE COMMAND TRAILER - NIGHT

segments.content:
ON THE VIDEO MONITOR - We see the illumination of the shower room

(transmitted from the S.E.A.L.s cameras.)
What's that...what the hell is that?

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - DRAINAGE PIPE UNDER SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT Goodspeed,

segments.content: Mason, and Lt.  Shepherd react to the sudden illumination above.

(whispers:)

		What's going on?

(whispers) 

		Don't know.

The S.E.A.L.s whirl around, startled, unnerved, squinting into the

blinding whiteness of the floodlights.

Drop your weapons.

The S.E.A.L.s, terrified, hesitate but do not drop their weapons They

stand back-to-back, weapons trained at the catwalk. squinting into the

white light.

The S.E.A.L.s behind the tiled columns take cover. we cannot yet see

Hummel and the marines.  This plays with as much tension as possible. 

The situation is chilling:

Anderson here, General Hummel. Commander.  Team

Leader.

Commander Anderson, if you have any concern for the lives

		of your men, you will order them to safety their weapons and place them

		on the deck at their feet-

ON THE VIDEO MONITOR - We see the floodlights above on the Mezzanine and

hear Hummells voice:
Oh Christ this isn't happening.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - SHOWER ROOM MEZZANINE- NIGHT

segments.content:
HUMMEL looks down at the S.E.A.L.s. Baxter's text to him.  The other

marines are at positions around the mezzanine perimeter, M-16's trained

and ready.

Sir, we know why you're out here.  God knows I agree

		with you sir, but like you sir, I swore to defend this country against

		all enemies.  Foreign, sir, and domestic. (shouts now) General, we've

		spilled the same blood in the same mud.  You know goddamn well that I

		cannot give that order...

BEHIND A COLUMN - S.E.A.L.s REIGERT and BOYER stare into the

floodlights.

Your unit is covered from an elevated position, Commander.  I'm

		not going to ask again.

CPTS.  FRYE, DARROW and PVTS.  COX, MCCOY, have their weapons trained;

they're pumped and trigger happy.
Don't do anything stupid, Commander. No one has to die here.

You men following the General: You are United States

		Marines and under oath you forgotten that?  We all have shipmates we

		remember - some of 'em were shit on and spit on by the Pentagon - that

		doesn't give you the right to mutiny.

That's a nice speech, Commander.  I heard plenty like it in the

		Pentagon and on Capitol Hill.  They all added up to zero.  Pretty words

		aren't gonna get you out of this, Commander.  Now abort this mission. 

		Goddamn it, abort.

BEHIND THE COLUMN - S.E.A.L. BOYER, just 20, having never seen combat,

is trembling with fear, indecision.
It's us or them, Reigert, fuck they're gonna waste us ...

Get a grip on yourself ....

ON THE MEZZANINE - PVT.  COXIS BOOT nudges a TILE which has come loose

from its mortar.  The tile inches to the edge of the mezzanine.  Then it

falls ......

BOYER, reacting to THE FALLING TILE, brings up his machine gun and fires

A SUSTAINED BURST in its direction --

And all hell breaks loose.  THE MARINES fire in unison.  A cruel

withering fusillade.

--- THE S.E.A.L.s in the middle of the floor take the brunt of it. They

gamely return fire.  But they're hit.  Again.  Again.  Again.

IN THE DRAINAGE HOLE - Goodspeed, Mason, and Lt.  Shepherd listen (and

watch, when the view allows) in utter horror to the firefight above.

Lt. Shepherd scrambles up the ladder. GOODSPEED 

grabs him. Tries to pull him down.
Don' t do it.

Let go of me.

Lt.  Shepherd climbs the ladder.

IN THE SHOWER ROOM - ANDERSON takes a bullet in his leg.  His automatic

blazing, he takes a bullet in the forearm.  The chest.  The shoulder.

-- THREE MARINES on the mezzanine are hit and killed.

-- LT.  SHEPHERD climbs out of the drainage pipe and comes up firing. 

He instantly takes a bullet through the visor, killing him instantly. 

SHEPHERD falls to his knees and pitches over, falling face first into --

THE DRAINAGE HOLE, where SHEPHERD'S lifeless eyes come face-to-face with

Goodspeed, who nearly passes out, then looks away in horror.

S.E.A.L.S BEHIND THE COLUMNS return fire.  They're hit, picked off.one

by one.

-- MARINE COX AND MCCOY fire a 50 CAL.  GUN (as powerful as

anti-aircraft or anti-tank round) through the column, killing REIGERT

and BOYER.

heading.subject: HOLD YOUR FIRE HOLD YOUR FIRE ....
heading.raw_text: HOLD YOUR FIRE HOLD YOUR FIRE ....
INT.  DRAINAGE PIPE UNDER SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT

segments.content:
Suddenly the-firing stops. GOODSPEED 

and MASON  freeze.  Thinking fast,

MASON  rips the TAC RADIO from Shepherd's helmet, takes his 9 MM PISTOL

and MACHINE GUN, and his SAW-TOOTHED KNIFE AND SHEATH, and climbs down.

Goodspeed, indecisive at first, clambers down after Mason.

heading.subject: An
heading.raw_text: INT.  PIER 39 - MOBILE COMMAND TRAILER - NIGHT ON THE VIDEO MONITOR - An

segments.content:
image transmitted from Anderson's helmet camera.  Anderson has fallen,

so this is at ground level.  We see corpses and near corpses.
It's over.

We've still got movement.  Numbers eleven and twelve. 

		That's GOODSPEED and.... Mason.
If mason's still alive, it's not over.

heading.subject: UNDER SHOWER ROOM
heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - TUNNELS UNDER SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT

segments.content: MASON and GOODSPEED exit the drainage pipe. GOODSPEED is panting, nearly hysterical.
We're never gettin off this island.

CARLA peers through a crowd of F.B.I. TECHS huddled around video and

audio monitors.  She freezes, her hands covering to her mouth at the

sound of:

(over tac radio) 

		.... god Jesus we're gonna die

Sanchez, agitated, exits the Command Trailer with Director Womack.  They

huddle, speaking in hushed voices.

You told me I am on a "need to know" basis.  Well goddamn it, I

		need to know.  Who the fuck is John Mason.  Start talking, Director, or

		I swear I will go to the press.

A tense pause.  Then Womack sighs, and his voice travels back three

decades ...

1962.  J. Edgar Hoover is head of the F.B.I.,

		some say the country.  It's no secret the esteemed Mr. Hoover kept

		microfilm files on prominent Americans and Europeans. de Gaulle, British

		members of Parliament, even the Prime Minister.  The man had dirt on

		everyone in the world,

heading.subject: UNDER THE SHOWERS
heading.raw_text: A174 INT.  ALCATRAZ - TUNNELS UNDER THE SHOWERS - NIGHT

segments.content:
Goodspeed, slumped in a corner, watches MASON  

arm himself.

He is a different person.  Alive.  Now in his element. pops the clip on

Shepherd's g mil gun.  Inspects it.  Unsheathes the saw-toothed knife. 

Sheathes it.

heading.subject: T
heading.raw_text: 174 INTERCUT - PIER 39 COMMAND CENTER / ALCATRAZ TUNNELS

segments.content:
The British sent over their best operative, John

		Mason, to steal it.

MASON grabs Shepherd's machine gun, pops the clip.

Our agents caught MASON  

		at the Canadian border but with no microfilm.  It's never been found. 

		So Hoover held him without trial.  The British claimed they didn't know him.
What about the daughter? why didn't Hoover use her as leverage?

He died in 1972.  She wasn't born yet Today it's

		a different Bureau and no one wants to touch this.

My god, you're not saying ...

MASON  slides the clip back in the machine gun.  Tests the action.

obviously comfortable with firearms ...

John MASON  

		has been incarcerated without trial on

		American soil since 1962. He knows our most intimate secrets of

		the last half century.  The alien landing at Roswell, the truth about

		the J.F.K. assassination.

heading.subject: BELOW SHOWER ROOM
heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - TUNNELS BELOW SHOWER ROOM - NIGHT

segments.content:
John MASON was an S.A.S. trained killer,

		one of MI-6's best operatives ever - John MASON  

		was one of the most dangerous men on earth.

MASON, armed and dangerous for the first time in 33 long years, faces

Goodspeed.  Brings his machine gun up. GOODSPEED 

raises his -9 mil pistol in self-defense.
Don't shoot me. MASON was actually slinging it over his shoulder...

For christ's sake. MASON trudges down the tu=el.  Goodspeed

		follows him.
Wait.  Where're you going?
Off this island.  You mind?

Yes I mind.  I mind very much.

From the tac radio in Mason's hand:

(over tac radio) 

		Goodspeed, Goodspeed, come in.

You've got a phone call.

MASON  throws the tac radio at Goodspeed's feet and trudges off. GOODSPEED 

grabs the tac radio.
It's me sir.
What is happening?  Where's Mason?
He says he's leaving the island sir.
Don't let him do that.
He's got a gun, sir.

What do you have, a FUCKING WATER PISTOL?  Get him back!

GOODSPEED hurries off after Mason.

Commander Anderson and the S.E.A.L.s lie dead, their blood running over

the tiles into the drainage grate.  Hummel, Baxter walk amongst the

corpses.
I never wanted this.  Jesus christ.
We knew it might happen, Frank.
Maybe now they'll pay up.
Maybe now they won't.

Then maybe we'll execute a few hostages.

One S.E.A.L. DANDO, is still alive.  He's gurgling blood. Staring up at

Hummel.
You'll go to hell for this General.

(to Pvt.  Royce) 

		Put a bullet in him.

Pvt.  Royce, appalled, can't bring himself to do it.

You heard him.  End it.

Cpt.  Darrow pulls his sidearm and levels it.

(lowers sidearm) 

		Yes sir.

Royce kneels.  Feels Dandols carotid artery.

He's dead anyway sir. 

Hummel leans down.  Stares into Dando's video feed.

heading.raw_text: INT.  PIER 39 - NIGHT womack and SANCHEZ

segments.content: stare at HUMMEL on the monitor.

(over monitor) 

		You have a made a terrible mistake and more

		of our brothers have died in vain.  Let's not repeat this.

The transmission goes dead.

Suddenly, SGT. drainage pipe,

CRISP bent over SHEPHERD'S CORPSE in.the shouts to Hummel:
General!  This man's weapons and tac radio are missing!

Rodent problem, people.  Let's flush the pipes.

Pvts.  Cox and McCoy go to the drainage pipe.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - MAIN CELL HOUSE - NIGHT

segments.content:
Hummel and his men exit the

Main Cell House and fan out in teams across the island.

SGTS.  CRISP and CPT.  HENDRIX move toward the power plant (above the

tunnel traveled by MASON and Goodspeed.)

Goodspeed's still trailing after

Mason.

would you stop.  Just stop. 

			(MASON  stops) 

		I don't know whatyou did or why you were sent to jail, but there are a million

		people across that bay who might die... 

			(MASON continues) 

		Fuck this. Stop.  Freeze.

MASON turns. GOODSPEED 

has his g gun trained on him.  He's not the most

convincing gun handler.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - IN FRONT OF POWER PLANT - NIGHT

segments.content:
Sgt.  Crisp and Capt.  Hendrix, walking toward the power plant, hear

something.  Beneath them, through a VENTILATION GRATE.  VOICES.

(whispers in tac mike) 

		Rodents located.

Hendrix and Crisp begin preparing a SATCHEL EXPLOSIVE.

MASON  and GOODSPEED as before. 

MASON  advances.
F.B.I. 	Stop right there.  I really mean it.

(stops) 

		If you really mean it, take the safety off.

GOODSPEED fiddles with the safety catch.  With a swipe, MASON  

snatches the gun.  They glare at each other.

(over tac radio) 

		Goodspeed.  Goodspeed, come in.  Have you resolved this?

Now he has all the guns, sir. . 

			(clicks off the tac radio)

		You've got to help me.  What do you want me to do, beg?

Save your breath and your dignity, if you have any.  I am leaving.

		I am getting my daughter and getting the hell out of here.

MASON walks off.  Suddenly stops.  THE SATCHEL EXPLOSIVE has fallen at

his feet.  MASON turns, looks at Goodspeed.  And they sprint back, the

way they came.

IN THE TUNNEL BEHIND THEM - A MONSTROUS EXPLOSION blows in the tunnel

and knocks MASON  and GOODSPEED to their feet.

PVTS.  COX AND MCCOY attach a bundle of C-4 to A TANK OF GASOLINE and

toss it down the drainage pipe.

The gas bomb detonates, blowin'g a wall of flame through the tunnel. 

The fire is looking for an escape, hunting and burning everything in its

path.

heading.subject: DOWN THE TUNNEL
heading.raw_text: DOWN THE TUNNEL - MASON  AND GOODSPEED

segments.content:
see the wall of flame ROARING

toward them.  MASON  

grabs Goodspeed.

Hold your breath.

They dive into a pool of stagnant water, submersing as the WALL OF FLAME

blows through the tunnel over their heads.

Mason, then Goodspeed, drags himself out of the water.

Come on.  And keep your mouth shut.

MASON  hurries off, GOODSPEED on his tail.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - SUBTERRANEAN CIVIL WAR RUINS - NIGHT

segments.content:
The tunnel leads here, to the Civil war era dungeon.  The tunnel's

bricked up; brick and mortar circa 1855.

Now what?

MASON moves to the bricked-up wall.  Feels around the mortar.  Smiles. 

Removes a brick. another.  Another.  A WHOLE CLUMP of bricks falls,

revealing A HOLE.

Came out right through there. (squeezes through the hole; mutters)

		'Course I've gained a few since ...

GOODSPEED follows MASON through the hole.

heading.raw_text: INT.  CIVIL WAR DUNGEON - OTHER SIDE OF THE WALL - NIGHT

segments.content:
MASON  and GOODSPEED emerge to a ledge which faces A POOL OF DANK STAGNANT WATER. 

It's about 3 ft. deep.

Across that, then 50 yards to the morgue. 

			(off Goodspeed's blank stare) 

		You said that's where the fucking poison is, Goodspeed.
I don't get it.  You're going to help me?

No. I'm going to give you dancing lessons.  What the fuck do you

		think?
You don't have to get all bent out of shape.

What's bent out of shape, idiot, is the tunnel I was going through

		to freedom five minutes ago.

All right, all right.  Don't call me idiot, okay?

MASON what did I do to deserve this?  What God did I offend .....

GOODSPEED begins to wade into the pool.

Stop. 

(GOODSPEED stops) 

There.  And there.

GOODSPEED squints.  The water slithers with COTTONMOUTHS. MASON  

unpack the QUART OF MOTOR OIL in spray bottle.

Cottonmouth snakes.  They breath through their skin.  Oil clogs

		it.  They hate the stuff.

sprays the motor oil across the pool.  The snakes scatter.  The

		pool's now coated with an OIL SLICK.  MASON  

		wades in.  Goodspeed follows.

The COTTONMOUTHS, repulsed by the oil, stay away. GOODSPEED 

tries not to look at the snakes.  They make it across.

Something's a little off here: I'm the F.B.I. Agent, you're

		the convict, and you have all the guns.

MASON slaps the .9 MM pistol into Goodspeed's hand walks off. 

GOODSPEED follows.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - TUNNEL UNDER PRISON MORGUE - NIGHT

segments.content:
MASON  and GOODSPEED 

arrive at a fork in the tunnel. _

DOWN THE FORK IN THE TUNNEL - is the PRISON MONO-RAIL SYSTEM: a single

rail suspended from the tunnel ceiling, upon which SMALL CARTS are

suspended.

The morgue?

MASON  nods.  Moves to a STEEL-RUNGED LADDER leading to a GARBAGE CHUTE

against the wall.  			GOODSPEED 

follows.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ROOM ADJACENT TO MORGUE - NIGHT

segments.content:
MASON and GOODSPEED emerge from the garbage chute.  They hear VOICES in

the next room.

PVTS.  GAMBLE and STARLING are guarding the poison. Starling's walking

around.  Gamble's seated on a MORTICIANIS TABLE, smoking.

The door bursts open.  MASON stands in the doorway.  GAMBLE dives away. 

STARLING whirls, raising his M-16.

MASON'S HAND flashes.  THE SAW-TOOTHED KNIFE flies the length of the

room and buries in Starling's neck.

Never hesitate.

Gamble fires from his position around the corner.  MASON and Goodspeed

dive for cover behind a cabinet. GOODSPEED fires from cover without

looking, his gun raised over the cabinet.  Mason, underneath the

heading.subject: cabinet, fires at GAMBLE'S FOOT.  Gamble, shot, hits the deck.
heading.raw_text: cabinet, fires at GAMBLE'S FOOT.  Gamble, shot, hits the deck.

segments.content:
GAMBLE unclips a GRENADE.  Before he can pull the pin....

MASON FIRES HIS CLIP EMPTY at the AIR CONDITIONER MOUNT on the ceiling

above Gamble.  The mount gives; the ENORMOUS AIR CONDITIONER falls,

crushing Gamble.  Gamble's GRENADE, still secured with the pin, rolls

away.

GOODSPEED rises.  Looks at Gamble under the air conditioner.  Just HIS

LEGS stick out. (Note: the rest of the scene's action plays out around

Gamble's legs.
You didn't learn that in prison.
No, and I used to be a lot quicker.

I've got some questions for you but they can wait.

GOODSPEED opens the CORPSE DRAWERS revealing the V.X-. CHEM ROUNDS

(shaped like big tennis ball cans).

GOODSPEED carefully lifts out a chem round.  MASON  

grabs one, accidentally knocking it against the drawer.

Careful.  The second you don't respect this, it kills you.

GOODSPEED and MASON set the V.X. chem rounds on the mortician's table. GOODSPEED 

pulls out his EQUIPMENT KIT.  Begins detaching the tops of the

chem rounds.

GOODSPEED reaches inside a chem round and carefully pulls out..... a

STRAND OF V.X. POISON PEARLS: ping-pong ball sized glass bubbles filled

with poison.

I need a hand here. 

			(MASON looks anxiously at the poison pearls.)

 		Mason.  Now.

hands the poison pearl strand to Mason.  MASON  holds it like a string 

of wind chimes.
What...  exactly does this do to you?

Any epidermal exposure or inhalation and you'll know: A twinge

		at the small of your back as the poison seizes the nervous system.

			(hands over another poison pearl strand) 

		Then loss of muscular function.

		Then you spit your guts out, it looks like a tub of spaghettils spilled

		on the floor, then your skin turns black...

MASON stares uneasily at the pearl strands.

Sounds like my first marriage.

GOODSPEED  has the chem round's GUIDANCE SYSTEMS exposed.  Inside are

tiny GUIDANCE SYSTEM MICRO-CHIPS. GOODSPEED 

plucks the chip from each chem round and pockets it.

(into tac radio) 

		Pier 39 come in.

(tac radio) 

		Goodspeed?  Where the hell have you been. Talk to me.

We're in the morgue.  I'm removing the rocket's guidance

		system chips.

			(to Mason) 

		Without em the rocketslll fly about 500

		feet and splash down like a wounded duck.

moves on to the third and fourth chem rounds. Suddenly there's

a BEEP. GOODSPEED and MASON whirl.  Pvt. Gamble's WALKIE TALKIE is

talking to them:

Gamble, Starling.  Come in.

MASON and GOODSPEED exchange a nervous look.
Privates Gamble and Starling, come in.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - NIGHT

segments.content: Hummel clicks off his walkie-talkie.  Stands there a second, thinking.
The morgue. Hummel and Baxter exit quickly.

GOODSPEED goes faster; his hands are

sweating, trembling.  It's like he's lost his spine. 

(And thinking about Carla, perhaps he has.)

C'mon c'mon....  faster ....

GOODSPEED nearly drops a chem round.  MASON  

recoils.
I thought you were cool under pressure.
Shut up; you're making me nervous.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - BETWEEN CELL HOUSE AND MORGUE - NIGHT

segments.content: Hummel and his men race toward the morgue.

GOODSPEED  has dealt with eight chem

rounds.  There should be seven more, but there's not. GOODSPEED 

counts them ....
They'll be on us in twenty seconds.

Wait a minute.  Fuck.  Hummel stole fifteen chem rounds. 

		There's only twelve here.  Here.  Quickly.  Do these last four.

MASON raises the poison pearl strands from each of the remaining four

chem rounds. GOODSPEED quickly plucks the chips from the guidance

systems.

Hummel and the marines converge on the morgue.  Surround the door.  They

burst inside, guns trained.
COX, MCCOY, and DARROW fire machine gun bursts at --

sprinting across floor, BULLETS chewing the

floor.  They dive into the MORGUE INCINERATOR CHUTE, GOODSPEED 

leaving the tac radio behind ....

GOODSPEED and MASON tumble out of the chute.  Two MONO-RAIL CARTS are

hanging there.  They exchange a look and climb into the first cart. 

MASON throws the cart's RELEASE LEVER.  The cart glides down the

mono-rail.
HUMMEL goes to the mortician's table.  Sees the theft of the guidance chips.

Hendrix!  Take Royce and Scarpetti!

CAPTAIN HENDRIX and PVTS.  ROYCE  

and SCARPETTI dive into the incinerator

chute after MASON  

and Goodspeed.
Gamble and Starling are dead.

heading.raw_text: INT.  TUNNEL UNDER MORGUE - MONO-RAIL TRACK - NIGHT

segments.content:
Hendrix, Scarpetti, and Royce tumble from the incinerator chute.  Mason

and GOODSPEED are down the Mono-rail track.

Hendrix gets in THE SECOND MONO-RAIL CART.  Scarpetti gets in THE THIRD

MONO-RAIL CART.  Hendrix and Scarpetti pull the release levers.  The

Mono-rail carts rumble after GOODSPEED 

and Mason.  Hendrix shouts back to Royce:

heading.time_of_day: NIGHT The three carts fly down the
heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - MONO-RAIL TUNNEL - NIGHT The three carts fly down the

segments.content:
mono-rail: GOODSPEED and MASON  

(in CART 1) 50 feet ahead of Scarpetti

(in CART 2), who is 50 feet ahead of Hendrix (in CART 3)

IN CARTS 2 AND 3 - SCARPETTI and HENDRIX fire M-16s.

and GOODSPEED duck as BULLETS RICOCHET around the tunnel walls.  

They pop up and return fire.

IN CART 2 - SCARPETTI arms hi over/under M-16 grenade launcher with a

grenade and...   FIRES.

THE GRENADE PROJECTILE shoots down the monorail tunnel.

duck as the GRENADE PROJECTILE wings

over their heads, continues down the tunnel

and DETONATES against the tunnel wall.

CART 1 roars through smoke and debris left by grenade explosion.  As it

rounds a corner, MASON  

grabs A SPLINTERED TIMBER and releases from the

cart.  CART 1, with GOODSPEED 

alone continues down the mono-rail.

MASON  yanks down a 5 ft. long BROKEN SECTION OF SEWAGE PIPE and presses

himself against the tunnel wall.

AS CART 2 rounds the corner...

WHAM!!  MASON  swings, hitting Scarpetti flush in the forehead, killing

him and blowing him off the cart.  Cart 2, without Scarpetti, continues

down the mono-rail.

MASON  waits.  As CART 3 rounds the corner

MASON  swings again But Hendrix is waiting for it. Hendrix grabs the

swinging pipe and pulls MASON  

into Cart 3!

Mason's sprawled on the floor of the cart.  Hendrix levels his M-16. 

MASON whipsaws the legs under Hendrix, bowling him over, the M-16

falling away from the cart.

MASON and Hendrix get to their feet.. They trade blow after blow as the

Cart ROARS through the tunnel.

looks over his shoulder at MASON  

and Hendrix locked in mortal combat.  He pulls the CART BRAKE.  Cart 1 begins

slowing down.  CART 2 (Scarpettils) rams into it. Now Carts 1 and 2 are

together.  And on comes --

CART 3 - Hendrix knocks MASON  

to the floor of the cart.  Hendrix dives

atop Mason, strangling him. mason's head is bent over the front lip of

the cart.  MASON looks down the mono-rail track.  To his horror he sees

CARTS 1 and 2 slowing down ...

realizes that his cart is going to ram Mason's

outstretched head.  He releases the brake, and Cart 1 picks up speed ...

IN CART 3 - Hendrix draws the knife.  Hendrix raises the knife.  With

his last strength, MASON rolls away.  Hendrix plunges the knife down,

missing Mason, him momentum carrying his head and shoulders over the

front lip of the cart.  MASON SCREAMS at Goodspeed.

pulls the cart brake and --

-- CART 3 SLAMS into CARTS 1 and 2 at 20 m.p.h., crushing Hendrixls head

and torso between Carts 2 and 3.

The collision knocks MASON  

off Cart 3, SLAMMING his head against the

tunnel wall.  MASON  falls unconscious.to the tunnel floor, while --

-- CART 1 is shoved by the collision across.a DITCH OF WATER in the

tunnel floor. GOODSPEED 

groggily gets to his feet. Jumps down from the cart.

Mason!

In the midst of this PVT.  ROYCE  

runs up.  Sees MASON concussed,

helpless.  Royce draws his GLINTING KNIFE.  Kneels over Mason.  He's

going to cut his throat.

Wait.

Royce lowers the knife.  Looks across the ditch at Goodspeed.  The ditch

is 20 ft. wide and filled with dank, stagnant water and we've seen dank,

stagnant water before.

Pretty easy killing an unconscious man. How about trying me? 

		Punk. 

			(beat) 

		What're you waiting for?  Limp dick.

I am going to fuck you up something fierce.  You rolled the wrong

		number, shithead.  You crapped out.

And ROYCE begins to wade into the ditch.  And GOODSPEED 

is looking at the water, waiting... ROYCE is waist deep now.  

Royce feels something. He winces.  Looks down at --

FIVE COTTONMOUTH SNAKES, fangs wide and white, plunging into him.  Royce

screams.  His knees buckle.  He falls to his knees in the water.  A

COTTONMOUTH stuck to his neck... Royce SHRIEKS again ...

And slides gently under the water.

I rolled snake-eyes.  Shithead.

Goodspeed, hand over hand on the monorail, eases the cart across the 

stagnant ditch.  Hops out.  MASON gets to his feet.  The two exchange a look.
Limp dick?

It's all I could think of.

They stumble off down the mono-rail tunnel.
I think I've got arthritis.

General Kramer, C.I.A. Director Amway, chief of Staff Hayden Sinclair

and Security Advisor Louis Lindstrom.

The President arrives in three hours.  His directive is

		to string Hummel along until the airstrike is operational.
What's the word from Mojave, General?

(grim) 

		They're going as fast as they can.

A corrugated aluminum hangar.  SUPER:

Mojave Desert United States Air Force Testing Facility

heading.subject: ING FACILITY WAREHOUSE
heading.raw_text: INT.  U.S.A.F. TESTING FACILITY WAREHOUSE - NIGHT

segments.content:
Looks like a Formula One garage.  ROCK MUSIC blares.

Eight GUIDED MISSILES (finned, 8 feet long) hand from hoists in various

states of repair.  U.S.A.F. TECHNICIANS hover over the missiles.

IN A CORNER - JIMKY FISK and LARRY GILER consult.
We're fucked, cap'n.

Are we fucked with a pencil or are we fucked with a baseball

		bat.

We're fucked with a telephone pole. (turns to the missiles) we

		can arm em with Willy Peter, no problem, but negatory pn smart bomb

		capability.
What are you saying?

The pilots are gonna have to drop em manually.  We're talkin,

		retro, baby.  We're talkin' World War II.

MASON and GOODSPEED 

emerge from the mono-rail tunnel.  The launcher on

China Alley is in the b.g. Suddenly, from the loudspeaker above them:

(loudspeaker) 

		Attention Navy Seals, attention.

MASON  and  GOODSPEED freeze.
He thinks we're Seals.

(loudspeaker) 

		Congratulations.  You've taken some things

		of mine.  I can't convince you to return them so I'll put on someone who can.

A pause.  Then A MALE VOICE.  Nervous.  Quivering.

(loudspeaker) 

		Hell...  hello.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - PRISON EXERCISE YARD - NIGHT

segments.content:
LARRY HENDERSON, 48, stands at the end of the exercise yard in a SPOTLIT

AREA.  Capt.  Darrow has his .45 placed against Larry's left temple.
Tell them your name and age.
My n...name is L... larry Henderson.  I'm forty-eight.
Good Mr. Henderson, continue ...
I don't know who you are, but p please, there's a gun

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - BEHIND CHINA ALLEY - NIGHT MASON

segments.content:
and Goodspeed, crestfallen, listen. LARRY HENDERSON (V.O.) (loudspeaker) ...	and

they're going to	oh god... (through tears) ...	please

don't kill me

Larry's quivering voice trails off.  Replaced by:

(loudspeaker)

		Convinced?  Mr. Henderson hopes so. You have

		two minutes.

GOODSPEED turns to Mason.
I'll go.
Wrong.
What, vou?
I'm not the chemical weapons expert.

GOODSPEED unpockets the V.X. ROCKET'S GUIDANCE CHIPS.  Hands them to

Mason.  MASON heaves them into the bushes.
What are you doing?
Now they only have three rockets left.
What about Mr. Henderson?
Hummel's a soldier, not a murderer.
Wait.

(stops; turns) 

		Find the rockets.  If they're guarded, kill the men

		guarding them.
I... I don't know if I can do this.

There's only one way to find out.  I'll try to give you time.  And

		Goodspeed.... 

				(tosses GOODSPEED his ATROPINE SYRINGE) 

		Don't be an idiot. Put that on.

MASON moves off into the night.

Well thank-you, thank-you very much.

GOODSPEED creeps toward the China Alley rocket launcher.

GOODSPEED moves under the grated, multi-level

structure of china Alley.  Looks up through the grate.  The ROCKET

LAUNCHER sits on the grate on the level above him.

MASON  walks down the middle of the cell block toward the opening to the

exercise yard.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - PRISON YARD - ONE MINUTE LATER - NIGHT

segments.content:
Darrow with his gun to Larry Henderson's head.  Hummel paces in the

background.  MASON emerges ftom the cell block.

MASON  walks up to Hummel.  The two stand there a moment, regarding each

other.

Gotta be kidding me.  They send an old man.

MASON gives Darrow a hard-eyed glance.  Hummel takes a lap around Mason,

sizing him up.

I thought I'd been in the service a long time.  Name and rank,

		sailor.

John Paul Mason. 

							(stares at Hummel) 

		Royal Navy.  Commander.
You're a long way from England, Commander Mason.
I feel strangely at home.
How's that?
You wouldn't believe me if I told you.

Do you have some unique knowledge of this prison facility,

		Commander Mason?
Quite unique.
How's that?

I was a guest here.

Glances all around.  Someone laughs.  Everyone laughs.

segments.content:
Pvt.  COX mans the

launcher.  Suddenly a voice:

Freeze. 

			(Cox freezes) 

		Drop the weapon and turn around. Slowly.

Pvt.  Cox drops his weapon.  Slowly turns.  Goodspeed, one hand on his

gun, the other on HIS TOOLS, begins to unscrew the V.X. CHEM ROUND

heading.raw_text: ON THE GRATED LEVEL ABOVE GOODSPEED

segments.content:
- PVT.  MCCOY appears. Looking down,

he sees GOODSPEED and Cox.  He cinches his REPELLING CLIP to the steel

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - PRISON YARD - CONTINUOUS - NIGHT

segments.content:
Well you're some kind of joker, Mason.  Maybe you're a lunatic. 

		Are you of sound mind, Mason?

I'm not threatening the lives of a million innocent people.  You

		are.

Hummells demeanor changes.  Hard now.  Tight.
Give me the guidance chips.
I threw them in the bay.
That was stupid of you.
(re: hostage Henderson)

heading.raw_text: The marines look at Hummel, wondering the same thing. 220  EXT.  CHINA

Suddenly PVT.  MCCOY repels to the level behind Goodspeed. Goodspeed

heading.subject: ion dangles in the air: Would you
heading.raw_text: MASON and Hummel.  The previous question dangles in the air: Would you

segments.content:
You seem like a bright man, Commander. Bright men understand

		necessity.

Bright men also obey the law. "Wherever law ends, terror begins."

		John Locke.

"Where there is no law, there is no transgression." The Bible. 

		Romans, Chapter 4, Verse 15.

Article 7, American Constitution?  "Treason against the United

		States shall consist of... 11

The American Constitution was written by traitors, Commander. 

		Traitors against a government founded on injustice and tyranny and

			(beat) 

		I see little difference in my motivation.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  CHINA ALLEY ROCKET LAUNCHING STATION - NIGHT

Goodspeed, inside the Civil War ruins, levels his gun at the door.  The

chip is in his free hand.

The door CREAKS open.
Do you, Commander Mason?

heading.raw_text: Suddenly GUNSHOTS.  Coming from China Alley.  Hummel and men whirl

segments.content: around, startled.
Frye, Crisp, go!

heading.raw_text: EXT.  CHINA ALLY ROCKET LAUNCHING STATION - NIGHT

segments.content:
GOODSPEED wildly

discharges his gun until CLICK, the clip is spent.  Cox and McCoy step

GOODSPEED shoves the guidance chip in his mouth.

Swallow that and I swear on my Aunt Myrtle's grave I'll cut your

		belly open and pull it out.

McCoy and Cox spring at Goodspeed.  McCoy whips the butt end of his gun

heading.subject: MCCOY He bit the fuckin' thing.  It's shot.
heading.raw_text: MCCOY He bit the fuckin' thing.  It's shot.
INT.  MAIN CELL HOUSE - CELL BLOCK 'ID" - MORNING

segments.content:
GOODSPEED squints through painful eyes, gaining consciousness. he looks

around, taking stock of the start cell on 'ID" block.  Gets to his feet.

 Goes to the bars:

Mason. 

						(no response) 

		Mason?
It's about time.
Where are you?

heading.subject: A CELL ON THE TIER ABOVE GOODSPEED -
heading.raw_text: A CELL ON THE TIER ABOVE GOODSPEED -

segments.content: MASON  sits on a bed.

Above you. 

						(under his breath)

		 Literally and figuratively.

WIDENING, we see that MASON'S MATTRESS has been ripped into long strips.

is BRAIDING THE STRIPS into a long rope.  The rope is quite

finely constructed.  Mason's been at this several hours.

INTERCUT BETWEEN THE TWO CELLS (and during the following, MASON

This is tiny.

You referring to your intellect, Goodspeed?  Or another portion of

		your anatomy ....
The cell, Mason.
Five feet by seven.  Try living in one for a year.  What happened?
I only got one chem round.  There are two left.  I fucked up.

(sarcastic) 

		Surprise, surprise.
I'm not a field agent, all right?  So cut me a break.
An F.B.I. Man asking me for a break. How droll.
What is your beef with the Bureau, anyway Clmon.  Tell me.

Let's say our countries had a little dispute.  They both knowingly

		shafted me.
How?

Familiar with the name Hoover, Goodspeed?  I don't mean a vacuum

		cleaner ...

GOODSPEED listens intently and

locations: LONG BEACH AIR FORCE BASE HANGAR
heading.raw_text: INT.  LONG BEACH AIR FORCE BASE HANGAR - MORNING

heading.subject: SUPER: LONG BEACH, CA.
heading.raw_text: SUPER: LONG BEACH, CA. - U.S. AIR FORCE BASE.

segments.content:
TECHNICIANS are frantically installing WILLY PETER INCENDIARY BOMBS

under the wings of an F-16.

ACROSS THE HMGAR - General Peterson and Captain Giler brief FOUR F-16

GENERAL PETERSON The target.  Alcatraz Island.  This is not a precision

LWO F-16 PILOT Sir, we hit that Island with Willy Peter and it's going

GENERAL PETERSON (grimly) That's why this is a volunteer mission,

Captain.  If any of you have doubts you can carry it out, speak up.

The pilots look at each other.  Silence.
Captain Giler?

We jerry-rigged a release lever.  You'll find it on the left

		side of the cockpit.  It's got two positions: safety and release.  Throw

		it on release, the bomb drops in five seconds.  Change your mind, throw

		it back on safety.  Any questions?

GOODSPEED stares blankly into space.  INTERCUT between the two cells

again.

Jesus. 

			(thinks) 

		Why didn't you just tell Hoover and the bureau

		where the microfilm was?  Make a trade?

Some trade.  They'd get the microfilm and I'd get a bullet in the

		head.

heading.subject: I see your point.  Something's been on my mind.  About your
heading.raw_text: I see your point.  Something's been on my mind.  About your

segments.content: escape.

What?

MASON  rises.  Lifts the bed.  Pulls off the bed's heavy ROLLING CASTER. 

Knots the caster onto one end of the braided rope.

You went down the shower drain, through the tunnels to the

		power plant, under the steam engine and out through the intake pipe -

		that much I've got ' But... howld you get out of your cell?

MASON leans out his cell and tosses the rolling caster down the cell

block.  The braided rope, tied to it, plays out to it's full length.

(cont'd) 

		I only ask because, in our current situation, it

		might be useful information ...

The result: the braided rope lies across the cell block floor, the

rolling caster tied to it.  MASON  holds the other end of the rope 

through the bars of his cell.

Trade secret, Billy, I'll tell you this:	it was easier than

		getting in.

fiercely yanks the rope toward him.  The heavy rolling caster

jerks from the floor.  The CASTER, pulling the rope, flies past Mason's

cell --

-- shooting in an arc around the corner of the cell block, still pulling

the rope, where --

-- the caster-pulled ROPE catches the CELL RELEASE LEVER against the

wall.  The rope coils, WRAP WRAP WHAP, around the release lever handle.

tugs the rope taut like he's just snagged a fish. Then he pulls

slowly and delicately.

THE CELL DOOR RELEASE LEVER pulls down and --

-~ MASON'S CELL DOOR (and all the doors on that tier) open at once.  And
smiles.

GOODSPEED hears the doors opening above

him.

Hey!  Hey what's happening? 

			(no response) 

		Mason.  Mason?

Suddenly Goodspeed's cell door opens. GOODSPEED exits the cell.  MASON

stands there.

You're on your own, kid.  Your gear's over there.

MASON  motions to a HEAP OF THEIR GEAR (clothes, weapons, flares) in the

corner of the cell tier.
Shit....
grabs his guns and gear and follows after

heading.subject: Mason. 225  EXT.  ALCATRAZ
heading.raw_text: Mason. 225  EXT.  ALCATRAZ - INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - MORNING Hummel

segments.content:
sits behind the desk.  Baxter, Frye, Darrow, Hendrix in front of him. 

Silence.  Hummel stares at his phone.  The tension is palpable.
Time.

(consults his watch) 

		Fifteen minutes Frank.

We have two operational rockets left, General.  One on the

lower lighthouse, one on the rooftop, ready for fire. (no response)

General.
I heard you Captain.
Prepare for launch General?  General?
Not yet.
General Hummel, noon is approaching.

I'm aware of the time, Captain.

Hummel glares at Frye, then at the phone.  Frye and Darrow .exchange a

look ....

heading.time_of_day: MORNING The clock on the wall reads
heading.raw_text: INT.  WHITE HOUSE - OVAL OFFICE - MORNING The clock on the wall reads

segments.content:
11:47. 13 minutes to go. General Kramer, Security Advisor Louis

Lindstrom, and C.I.A. Director Milton Amway.

When was the last communication from our men on

		Alcatraz?

Seven hours ago.

The Naval Attache enters excitedly. NAVAL ATTACHE General, the white

phosphorous attack is operational.

General Kramer grabs the phone.
Get me the President.

MASON  emerges from the parade ground ruins and moves down the embankment

toward the water. GOODSPEED stays above.

Mason.  John. 

							(MASON stops) 

		What happened - the injustice done

		to you - doesn't mean you can walk away from this.  A million people

		across that Bay will die.
Only one of them I care about.
You were once a different man.
You don't know what kind of man I was.

You were a civil servant.  Sworn to do your duty.  Just like

		me.

MASON  begins climbing down to the waterline.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - MORNING

segments.content:
Hummel, with Baxter, Hendrix, Frye, Darrow and Crisp.  The atmosphere is

now so fucking thick you can cut it.
Eleven fifty-seven, General.  Three minutes to go.
They're going to call.
They are not going to call General.
I... I don't understand this.

I understand it.  They're calling our bluff.  We have two

		operational rockets left.  We have to stick one of those rockets in

		their ear, General.
Atom?
I'...I don't know Frank.
Seventy thousand peqple...  I didn't... i didn't ever...

You didn't ever what? 

			(no response) 

		You didn't ever what, General? 

			(gets in Hummel's face) 

		General, forty-eight hours ago I was in

		a cushy job at Pendleton.  As of this moment I am subject to prosecution

		for treason and murder.  Do you know what that means.  It means the

		electric chair.  For all of us.

He's right Frank.  Authorize the launch or it's over.

All eyes on Hummel now.

Authorize the launch, General.

Hummel nods and

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - ROOFTOP OF MAIN CELL HOUSE - MORNING

segments.content:
Capt.  Frye and Sgt.  Crisp approach the rocket launcher across the roof

of the main cell house.

heading.time_of_day: MORNING Mason's wading into the water
heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - PARADE GROUND - MORNING Mason's wading into the water

segments.content: now.
You'll never make it.

I once swam the English Channel, but you're entitled to

		your,opinion.

Goodspeed, disgusted, turns and heads back, grumbling.
Fine.  I'll fuckin, do it myself.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ROOFTOP OF MAIN CELL HOUSE - MORNING

segments.content:
CAPT.  FRYE AND SGT.  CRISP on the roof, ready the rocket launcher. 

Hummells VOICE comes over Fryels walkie-talkie:

(over walkie-talkie)

		Launch coordinates 675 dash 439.

Aye aye General: coordinates 675 dash Awaiting launch

		command.
Hummel stares at a GRIDDED MAP OF THE BAY ARF.A.

(over walkie-talkie) 

				(beat) 

		General, your command.

(closes his eyes)

		Fire.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ROOFTOP OF MAIN CELL HOUSE - MORNING

segments.content:
Frye presses the ignition switch.  The ROCKET'S TAIL fires. It ROARS off

the launcher.  Toward Oakland.

CLOSE ON MA-SON - as he watches the V.X. ROCKET ROARING over his head

toward civilian populdtion.

(hushed) 

		My god. MASON looks up. GOODSPEED stands above on the

		embankment.
That change things?
the F.BI. RADAR TECHNICIAN stares at the RADAR SCREEN.

They fired a rocket.  It's headed east.

Everyone stares at the radar screen.  A hush.

East.  But that's... Oakland. (dawns on him) My god.  The

		football game.
comes back up the embankment.  Faces Goodspeed-with grim resolve:
Partners?

Partners.

The two men clasp hands and

60,000 FOOTBALL FANS scream as THE OAKLAND RAIDERS sprint onto the

field.  Above, unbeknownst to anyone --

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER OAKLAND CALIFORNIA - DAY

segments.content: The V.X. ROCKET arcs over Oakland and --

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - DAY

segments.content:
-- Hummel, Baxter, and Darrow stare at the transmission from the

rocket's optic camera.

ON THE VIDEO MONITOR - We first see CLEAR SKY.  The rocket reaches its

apex.  Blue sky is now replaced by THE OAKLAND COLISEUM directly below. 

We descend on 60,000 people.

watches the video monitor nervously. His jaws

twitch.

He looks at the ROCKET GUIDANCE CONTROL COMPUTER.  He looks at the video

monitor.

He can't take it.  Hummel lunges for the ROCKET GUIDANCE CONTROL

COMPUTER.  Darrow tries to restrain him, but -- Hummel punches in NEW

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER OAKLAND COLISEUM - DAY

segments.content:
The V.X. Rocket's GUIDANCE CONTROL suddenly BLINKS RED. the rocket veers

off on a new vector.  Heading now toward San Francisco Bay.  And

The F.B.I. Radar Technician reacts to the change in the rocket's

trajectory.
Sir, it's heading.,.into the bay?
A CHARTER FISHING BOAT bobs in the bay.

Four GUYS are fishing.  Relaxing.  Drinking beers. one guy looks up. 

Sees something.
What the hell.... ?

heading.subject: down.
heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER SAN FRANCISCO BAY - DAY The V.X. rocket screams down.

segments.content:
at 500 ft. altitude it DETONATES.  Showering a cloud of V.X. POISON onto

the bay.

heading.subject: 247 EXT.  CHARTER FISHING BOAT
heading.raw_text: 247 EXT.  CHARTER FISHING BOAT - DECK - DAY

segments.content:
The FISHERMEN stand there, stunned as DROPLETS OF V.X. POISON fall upon them.  

It's like a grey drizzle.

The Fishermen exchange looks.  Hold out their hands, catching "rain

drops".  One of them spasm.  Another.  The others.  Skin turns black. 

Blood runs from pores.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ROOFTOP OF MAIN CELL HOUSE - DAY

segments.content: Frye and Crisp stare across the Bay in disbelief.

I don't believe it.  He pulled the plug.

Frye, disgusted, races down the STAIRS.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - IN FRONT OF INFIRMARY - DAY

segments.content:
Frye stalks into the infirmary.  MASON  

and GOODSPEED come around the corner and steal inside the infirmary.

heading.raw_text: INT.  WHITE HOUSE - OVAL OFFICE - DAY

segments.content:
Chief of Staff Hayden Sinclair stands before the desk of the President

of the United States.

They need a decision Mr. President.

The President (who we don't see) gazes into the East Garden.

The President hits his INTERCOM to the room where his cabinet is

These past few hours have been the longest, darkest of my

		life.  This is when you wish the buck did not stop here. 

			(beat) 

		A balance between two tragedies. On one hand the fate of a million civilians. 

		On the other, Frank Hummel.  That we have ignored or abandoned or marginalized

		a great soldier like Frank Hummel and that American boys have paid the

		price of that neglect in blood, is equally real, and equally tragic.

The glass is half full not half empty, sir.  No civilian

		casualties so far.

I don't believe in half full or half empty, Sinclair.  There

		are chemical weapons and there are civilians.  And there are men on

		Alcatraz wholve proved they're willing to use the one on the other.

		(beat) We are at war with terror.  Fighting a war means casualties. 

		This is the worst call I've ever had to make. (takes the phone) Air

		strike approved.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  PIER 39 COMMAND CENTER - MOBILE WAR ROOM - DAY

segments.content: Sanchez, Womack, Carla, silent around speakerphone.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  LONG BEACH AIR FORCE BASE - DAY

segments.content: The F-16s ROAR down the runway, lifting into the sky.

MASON and GOODSPEED move silently down the corridor.  They pass the

HEAVY STEEL DOOR of the Marinets Command Center.  It's ajar.  Voices

emanate within.

 GOODSPEED and MASON

heading.subject: move inside the adjacent room. B253   INT.
heading.raw_text: move inside the adjacent room. B253   INT.

segments.content:
INFIRMARY ROOM ADJACENT TO COMMAND CENTER - DAY There's a 4 x 16 inch

slit in the wall.  MASON  and  GOODSPEED 

position themselves on either

side, watching and eavesdropping on the drama unfolding within.

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - DAY

segments.content: Frye, Darrow and Baxter. All staring at Hummel.
You're gutless.  I knew it.
The problem is now thev know it.

Careful son.  I'd maintain discipline if I were you.

Darrow draws his .45, levels it at Hummel.  INTERCUT with MASON  

and

Goodspeed's reactions.
I'm relieving you of your command General.  Captain Frye?
I'm in.

Major?

Major  Baxter looks from Darrow to Hummel.
Tom?

It's over Frank. 

							(to Darrow) 

		I'm in.

Hummel blinks.  He can't believe this.
Tom, I warn you.
Stand down, General.
I'm giving you a direct order.

(draws his .45) 

		I'm not accepting it.

and MASON  exchange a tense look. mason

aims his gun through the slit ...

HUMMEL draws his .45 but Baxter fires first, hitting Hummel squarely in

the chest.
FIRES through the slit, killing Baxter as --

heading.subject: toward the STEEL DOOR behind him.  He wrenches it
heading.raw_text: HUMMEL , gunshot, reels toward the STEEL DOOR behind him.  He wrenches it

segments.content:
open and lunges outside into the corridor.  IN THE CORRIDOR - MASON

fires into the command center, sending Frye and Darrow diving for cover.

grabs the semi-consious Hummel and drags him down the

corridor-.

drags Hummel inside. Hummel

collapses against the wall.

His blood runs across the tiled floor.  MASON  

takes a defensive position

in the washrooms doorway.

DARROW AND FRYE attack through the infirmary's maze of rooms, taking

cover where they can, squeezing off rounds.

MASON fires at Darrow and Frye from the doorway while GOODSPEED 

kneels over Hummel.  Hummells dying and knows it. he stares at Goodspeed

through glassy eyes.
My god what have I done ...

It's not too late, General.  Tell me where the last chem round

		is.

(gasps for air) 

		Lower lighthouse ...

Hummel dies.  MASON and GOODSPEED turn from Hummel to each other.
Do your job, Billy. - I'll try to hold ,em off.

blasts away at Frye and Darrow, allowing GOODSPEED 

to sprint for

the exit toward the lower lighthouse.

As Frye holds down MASON  

with fire, Darrow sprints for the opposite

exit.  Frye, firing while retreating, moves back inside the Command

Center.

GOODSPEED exits and sprints toward the lower

lighthouse.

Sgt.  Crisp smokes a cigarette next to launcher. GOODSPEED  enters, 

gun raised.  Crisp spins, drawing his .45.
Don't ...

heading.subject: dead. A255 INT.  INFIRMARY -
heading.raw_text: shoots Crisp.  Crisp falls dead. A255 INT.  INFIRMARY -

segments.content:
advances toward the command center's door. 

Suddenly the HEAVY STEEL DOOR creaks open and --

-- A SATCHEL EXPLOSIVE flings out, sliding across the corridor floor

toward Mason.  MASON  

turns and sprints away.  Frye bolts from the room,

s printing the other way.

dives away as the satchel DETONATES, imploding the corridor walls,

collapsing the,ceiling. mason's engulfed in two tons of-plaster and

crumbled cinder block.

Goodspeed's detached the V.X. CHEM ROUND from the rocket. He's about

ready to pull out the poison pearls when..

DARROW barges in.  GOODSPEED, c hem round in hand, moves behind the

stairway and scaffolding in the room,s middle.

heading.time_of_day: DAY Frye, at the GUIDANCE CONTROL
heading.raw_text: INT.  INFIRMARY COMMAND CENTER - DAY Frye, at the GUIDANCE CONTROL

segments.content: COMPUTER, into walkie talkie.

Crisp, Darrow, come in... (thinks; clicks walkie talkie to

new channel) Cox, McCoy, get your asses up here!

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - WHARF WATCH TOWER - DAY

segments.content:
Pvts.  Cox and McCoy, standing watch, leave the watch tower and hurry

toward the infirmary and lower lighthouse.

Darrow moves one way, GOODSPEED 

the other. GOODSPEED holds the chem

round in front of him.
Give that to me.

You shoot me, I'll drop this and we're both dead.  One of

		these pearlslll kill everything within 200 feet.  You know how this shit

		works?

Darrow drops his gun.  Pulls out a TITANIUM BLADED KNIFG.

You know how this shit works?

Darrow advances on Goodspeed.  The only route to GOODSPEED 

is between the rocket and the window.  Darrow continues advancing., GOODSPEED 

eyes the launcher's IGNITION SWITCH.  As Darrow passes between thewindow and

the launcher ....
You know the Elton John son, "Rocket Man"?

I hate it.

Darrow lunges. GOODSPEED 

stabs the IGNITION SWITCH.  The VX ROCKET

LIFTS OFF, HITTING Darrow square in the chest.

-- The VX ROCKET BLOWS Darrow THROUGH THE WINDOW and wings off, clearing

the cliffs.  Darrow falls from the rocket --
Well it happens to be my favorite fuckin, song!

DARROW plummets, IMPALING himself on a STEEL FENCE SPIKE. The VX ROCKET

swerves madly across the bay --

heading.raw_text: INT.  PIER 39 COMMAND CENTER - MOBILE WAR ROOM - DAY

segments.content:
Second rocket's away, sir. (confused look) It

		went in the Bay sir.

Goodspeed's alone now with the last V.X. CHEM ROUND.  He -pulls out the

STRAND OF POISON PEARLS.  Suddenly an AXE BLADE comes through the door.

outside --

heading.time_of_day: DAY -- CAPT.  FRYE chops at the door lock with
heading.raw_text: EXT.  LOWER LIGHTHOUSE - DAY -- CAPT.  FRYE chops at the door lock with

segments.content: a FIRE AXE.

GOODSPEED  looks around frantically.  Only

one place to go. Up. GOODSPEED 

scrambles up the interior metal stairs.

emerges on the roof.  Sets down the chem round.  Pulls out the

POISON PEARL STRANDS, his hand shaking.  With the other hand, he unclips

the ROCKET GUIDANCE CHIP.

The COPPER STRANDS holding the pearls are corroded.  A strand BREAKS. 

Four PEARLS fall. GOODSPEED 

catches three.  The FOURTH drops, hitting

his SHOE.  It rolls along the rooftop. GOODSPEED 

sets aside the other

pearls and dives, grabbing the stray pearl an inch from the roof,s edge.

Suddenly THE HUGE LIGHTHOUSE WINDOW behind GOODSPEED 

EXPLODES, showering GOODSPEED with glass.

ON THE ADJACENT ROOFTOP ~ PVT.  MCCOY, wielding a smoking .60 Cal

MACHINE GUN.  McCoy fires a wicked, long, sustained burst, emptyinc his

entire ammunition belt.

THE LIGHTHOUSE SEARCHLIGHT FRESNEL blows to shreds.

GOODSPEED rolls away, GLASS SHARDS raining down on him, cutting him-.  

He's a sitting duck.

MCCOY casts aside the .60 Cal and unshoulders a SNIPER RIFLE.  Draws a

bead on GOODSPEED 

again.  GOODSPEED, bleeding, terrified, cowers,

awaiting death.

A SILHOUETTE APPEARES behind McCoy.  It's MASON, dirty and bloodied. 

McCoy spins.  MASON  

bats the rifle aside, KNEES McCoy in the solar

plexus, grips McCoyls NECK -- SNAP! -and HURLS him off the roof.  McCoy

falls 5 floors.

GOODSPEED gives MASON a thankful glance.  And hears THE DOOR BURST OPEN
FRYE roars inside.  Looks around.  Starts up the stairs.

FRYE barges onto the roof.  Sees the DISMANTLED CHEM ROUND.  Goodspeed's

at the edge of the roof looking down.

Give me the guidance chip.

Frye raises his M-16 as GOODSPEED 

jumps.  Lands hard on the ground below and sprints off.

locations: IN FRONT OF THE LOWER LIGHTHOUSE
heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - IN FRONT OF THE LOWER LIGHTHOUSE - DAY

segments.content: GOODSPEED  sprints toward the NEW INDUSTRIES BUILDING.

Frye fires form the roof.  M-16 ROUNDS kick up dirt around Goodspeed. 

Frye curses and head back down the stairs.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - IN FRONT OF LOWER LIGHTHOUSE - DAY Frye exits and

heading.subject: sprints after Goodspeed. INT.  MAIN CELL HOUSE
heading.raw_text: sprints after Goodspeed. INT.  MAIN CELL HOUSE - STAIRWELL - DAY Mason

segments.content:
come down the stairs.  Suddenly PVT.  COX looms on the stairs below. 

Faces off with Mason.  Cox draw his knife and lunges.  MASON  

catches Cox' wrist.

Cox, with his free hand, hits Mason.  Hard.  MASON recoils.  Counter

punches.  On comes Cox.  He's huge and menacing.  He hits MASON  

again. Again.  Again.  Cox has MASON  backed up to the stairwell. -

Goodspeed, frantic, sprints across the floor, SPLASHING through puddles.

He loses his footing. falls and slides across the floor, clutching the

guidance chip an,d pear.

He gets to his feet.  LIMPS behind some RUSTY MACHINERY.

FRYE enters.  Sees RIPPLES IN PUDDLES left by Goodspeed. Frye creeps

across the floor.  Following the ripples.

heading.raw_text: INT.  MAIN CELL HOUSE - STAIRWELL - DAY

segments.content:
Mason's nearly through.  Backed up against the railing.  Cox comes in

again.  WHAM WHAM.  MASON spits blood and teeth. MASON'S moves to

his pocket.  As Cox comes in for the death blow --

MASON  pulls the MOTOR OIL from his picket and sprays it in Cox's eyes. 

The big man is dazed, blinded.  MASON  

steps aside and rams Cox over the

railing.  Cox falls to his death on the floor below.  MASON  

looks down

at him.
Snakes hate the stuff.

Frye creeps close to Goodspeed's hiding place. GOODSPEED 

lunges from

behind the machinery, jamming his fingers into Fryels mouth and ramming

home the POISON PEARL.

GOODSPEED HAMMERS his fist into Fryels JAW.  We hear the glass breaking

in Fryels mouth.  Fryels eyes widen.  GREY SMOKE SPEWS FROM HIS MOUTH

AND NOSTRILS.  His eyes bulge.

GOODSPEED tries to step away.  Frye bearhugs him, pressing his face

close.  Frye open his mouth, spewing forth a CLOUD OF POISON in

Goodspeed's face.

You're comin, with me.

GOODSPEED shoves Frye away.  Frye drops, his body quivering.  Blood

pours form his ears and nose.  Frye spasms in a sickening dance of

death.

GOODSPEED reels away,.  COUGHING.  Dizzy, he falls to his knees.  He's

gassed and knows it.  Desperately, he rips at his PANDLEG.  A SYRINGE

taped to his calf.  ATROPINE.

He pulls it free and hesitates.  A beat, then -- He PLUNGES the long

needle into his chest.  Into his heart.  Depresses the plunger.

locations: SKIES OVER SAN FRANCISCO BAY AREA
heading.raw_text: EXT.  SKIES OVER SAN FRANCISCO BAY AREA - DAY

segments.content:
-- The F-169, flying north along the California.Coastline, bank right

and dive down onto San Francisco Bay.

Goodspeed's world slows down.  Is he dying?  He sees IMAGES in SLOW

MOTION He and Carla together his parents moments from his childhood...

Slowly Goodspeed's breathing normalizes.  He gazes up at the dawning

sky.  SEES something shimmering in the distance.  Through the HEAT WAVES

...

Sanchez, Director Womack, and the F.B.I. TECHNICIANS watch from the

window as --

THE F-16s wing across the Bay toward Alcatraz.
May god have mercy gn their souls.

(face buried in his hands) 

		You can't do this, you can't let this

		happen.

exits and kneels, reaching for HIS OTHER PANTLEG.  PUllS out

his GREEN FLARES.  He cracks the flares and fires them up.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  SAN FRANCISCO BAY BRIDGE - DAY

segments.content:
The F-16s fly under the span of bridge, just 50 feet off the water,

shooting up a PLUME OF WATER.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - NEW INDUSTRIES BUILDING - DAY GOODSPEED, in slow

segments.content: motion, waves the flares.

heading.time_of_day: DAY The LEAD F-16 Pilot speaks on this
heading.raw_text: INT.  LEAD F-16 - COCKPIT - DAY The LEAD F-16 Pilot speaks on this

segments.content:
air-to-air mike.

LEAD F-16 PILOT Arm up.

heading.raw_text: INT.  PIER 39 - F.B.I. COMMAND CENTER - DAY

segments.content:
CARLA watches the approach of the F-16s on Alcatraz in horror.  Every

second is excruciating.

Ten seconds to the drop zone.  And now counting eight,

		seven, six ...

heading.raw_text: EXT.  WORLD WAR II BUNKER (SPOTTING POSITION #1) - DAY

segments.content:
A hilltop on the Marin side of the Golden Gate Bridge.  Two spotters

watch the action through SPOTTING SCOPES.  SPOTTER 1 watches the F-16s. 

SPOTTER 2, watching ALCATRAZ, nearly jumps out of his skin.

Green smoke!  It's...   GOODSPEED!!

A RADIO OPERATOR fires a message to command.

heading.raw_text: INT.  PIER 39 ~ F.B.I. COMMAND CENTER - DAY

segments.content: Abort.  Abort immediately.

On come the F-16s, ROARING over Alcatraz.  They're almost on top of GOODSPEED 

now.  It's too late.  It's all over.
(v.o. cockpit radio)
LEAD F-16 PILOT Abort.  Abort.

heading.subject: THE LEAD F-16 PILOT safeties the bomb release lever. 276 INT.  REAR F-16
heading.raw_text: THE LEAD F-16 PILOT safeties the bomb release lever. 276 INT.  REAR F-16

segments.content:
The REAR F-16 PILOT is wrestling with his release lever. It's stuck.  He

can't "safety" it.
Sir, something's wrong.  I can't disengage... !
Then peel off...

The four F-16s veer away from the island.  But for the REAR JET, the

order came too late ...

heading.raw_text: EXT.  REAR F-16 - WING UNDERCARRIAGE - DAY

segments.content:
The REAR F-16 releases its Willy Peter canisters.  They plummet to the

island.

heading.raw_text: EXT.  ALCATRAZ - NEAR NEW INDUSTRIES BUILDING - DAY

segments.content: The WILLY PETER CANISTERS land, detonating on impact in a MONSTROUS

The awesome concussion knocks GOODSPEED 

off the New Industries Building pier into the bay.

Goodspeed, concussed in the water, tries to keep consciousness.  He

can't.  He sinks.

ANOTHER FORM appears above him.  It's MASON, swimming for Goodspeed. 

MASON gets under his arms and pulls him up.

MASON drags  GOODSPEED 

ashore.

Sanchez, Director Womack and the F.B.I. TECHNICIANS stare out the window

at Alcatraz, enshrouded in PLUMES OF SMOKE.

Total silence.  Only CARLA, weeping quietly in the corner.  SANCHEZ  

puts his arm around her.  Ushers her away.  Suddenly a VOICE CRACKLES:

Pier 39 come in.  Pier 39  ...

			(freezes) 

		My god he's alive.

Director Womack grabs the mike.

Goodspeed, this is Director Womack. Are the

hostages alive?
Every one of em sir.
What about Mason?

heading.raw_text: INT.  ALCATRAZ - CIVIL WAR RUINS - DAY

heading.subject: ion dangle.
heading.raw_text: GOODSPEED stares at Mason, letting the question dangle.

segments.content:
Goodspeed.  Is Mason-alive?

A pause.  The question still dangling there.  Then:

(deep breath) 

		Just come and get me, sir.  I'm tired.

Name your vacation spot, Goodspeed. The Bureau'll pay for it.

GOODSPEED hangs up.  The two men regard each other.

Mason, uhm, John, I have something to tell you.  You know that

		pardon contract you signed?
Womack ripped it up, right?
You knew?  All this time?
I'm not a fool, Billy.

All I know is that whatever you did, you don't deserve to go

		back.
Goodspeed.  You know the etymology of your name?
God's speed.

Yes.  To wish someone a prosperous jouey.

MASON smiles. GOODSPEED 

smiles back.  There is an immediate tacit

understanding.

And if you turn around I'll tell you a secret.

Goodspeed, confused by this, gives MASON  

a look.  Slowly turns around. Camera doesn't leave him.

St. Michael's Church, Fort Walton, Kansas.  Front pew. 

		Right leg.  Hollow.

What's that? (beat) Mason?

GOODSPEED turns around.  John Paul MASON  is gone.
GOODSPEED is standing on the dock.  Sanchez comes down the gangplank.
You surprised me, kid.  Never thought you could do it.
Neither did I sir.
Where's Mason?
Vaporized, sir.  Blown out to sea.
He saved my life, sir. Is SANCHEZ  going to accept this? .

Yes 

				(smiles; acknowledges) 

		Poor son-of-a-bitch.
Sir, the White House calling.  It's the President.

I'll take it.

WOMACK elbows past GOODSPEED 

and Sanchez.

Uhm, sir, actually it's for Goodspeed.

Womack glares at Goodspeed, who takes the phone.
Bill Goodspeed, Mr. President.

I am in your debt, Goodspeed, the country is in your

		debt.  You're a hero, son.

Thank you, Mr. President.  The man you should be thanking is

		John Mason.

So I've been informed. Would you put the F.B.I.

		Director on please?

Director Womack.

GOODSPEED hands the phone to Womack.  Womack looks at the phone.  Slowly

takes it.
I can explain all of this, sir ...

I don't want your explanation, Womack. I want your

		resignation.

Womack grimaces.  Goodspeed, smiling to himself, turns away. CARLA 

races into his arms.  A long, warm embrace.
A jeep motors up the Freeway.  Passing a sign: VANCOUVER 30 MILES.
MASON and Jade.  Jade driving.  Father smiles.  Daughter smiles back.
BEGIN CLOSING CREDITS.  The following plays over:

locations: A ROAD IN FORT WALTON, KANSAS
heading.raw_text: EXT.  A ROAD IN FORT WALTON, KANSAS - DAY

segments.content: A beat-up PORSCHE SPEEDSTER exits a BAPTIST CHURCH.

Carla is driving. GOODSPEED 

next to her.  He opens a WORN PLASTIC CANISTER.  Spools out a REEL OF MICROFILM.
Would you please tell me what this is all about... ?
You want to know who really killed President Kennedy, honey...?

A MONTAGE of short INTERCUT scenes, all AFTERNOON:
Agent wood gives him a curious look and CUT TO:
HOLD ON GOODSPEED'S reaction, and CUT TO:
MASON and Womack stare at each other and CUT TO:
Now it's just MASON and GOODSPEED and CUT TO:
GOODSPEED ROARS off on the motorcycle and CUT TO:
General Kramer picks up the phone and CUT TO:
The Incursion Team files through the door and CUT TO:
